metadata.name: Bandits #0001
metadata.description:
Surge is a utility-backed Anime PFP collection that emphasizes lore based digital collectibles. Let's embrace the artwork originated from our artist's love and passion for a well-known theme-based setting in the Dystopian World.Your bandits grant you access to a community divided into 4 Syndicates, each accommodating a purpose in the cryptic city of Surge.
  Shall we live or shall we kill?
